name: dotNetN-Tier
0:
”Alexa, open dot Net N Tier”
”Alexa, launch dot Net N Tier”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dot net n. tier
des:
Ever wonder how a web site displays data stored in databases? 
Ever think of how to develop a web site using custom programming to allow the web site visitor to interact with a database, or to provide the user with detailed reports, charts or other visual elements dynamically generated at the click of a button?

Setting up a web site structure with ASP.Net and N-Tier Architecture allows for an ever-expanding, versatile landscape for providing up-to-date, relevant information to the web site user at the touch of a button.
dot Net N-Tier skill provides information about the structure of an interactive, integrated web site, in the simplest of terms.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
